title: The Blaze of the Dragon's Heart
description: Can’t a girl catch a break?The evil mage the dragon world thought was long dead? Turns out…not so much. Vazha’s back with a vengeance, ready to destroy dragonkind and enslave the human population.My boys and I may have rescued my best friend, but the devastating news Uncle Max has been captured means we can’t go home until Vazha is destroyed. And no one’s kidding themselves, it’s not going to be easy.We’re no match for his forces or growing powers and have almost no hope of success, but a surprise discovery reveals the one person in the world who stands a chance against him.Me.Oh, boy, this is gonna be fun.The Blaze of the Dragon’s Heart is the thrilling conclusion to the Harem of Fire series, a medium-burn reverse harem fantasy romance featuring five dead-sexy dragon shifters and one sassy human heroine with a propensity for finding trouble. Pulse-pounding action and adventure mixed with schmexy lovin' and an HEA for all.
author: Willa Hart
